title: Submit a Uk Property Business' Accounting Adjustments
description: This endpoint allows the developer to provide accounting adjustments against a specified Business Source Accounting Summary quoting its unique identifier. The BSAS ID quoted must be for a Uk Property Business, and it must not have been adjusted, previously.  Only data for one property business (either uk-property-fhl-eea or uk-property) should be included in any submission.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is the retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
